attributes.action: and other key ministers to spend a day in a wheelchair and try  getting around London using public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a wheeelchair user and me and my mother have always said that you don't get an idea of how hard life is(especially transport) unless you actually sit in a wheelchair and actually try it. Hopefully, if the PM agrees to do this, it will prompt him to help us sort out issues of independence.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
